lines.text: If it's just for laughs, then I want to be in on the joke from the start.
You get in my way and I'll kill you.
You took the words right out of my mouth.
You know, any evidence obtained through 'third degree' methods is inadmissable in court.
I'm relieved you know how to read.
What do I do now, Johnny?
Dry your eys and blow your nose in the order named.
